Package esapi4cf.org.owasp.esapi

Interface Summary
AccessController
AccessReferenceMap The AccessReferenceMap interface is used to map from a set of internal direct object references to a set of indirect references that are safe to disclose publicly
Authenticator
Encoder
EncryptedProperties The EncryptedProperties interface represents a properties file where all the data is encrypted before it is added, and decrypted when it retrieved
Encryptor
Executor
HttpServletRequest
HttpServletResponse
HttpSession
HTTPUtilities The HTTPUtilities interface is a collection of methods that provide additional security related to HTTP requests, responses, sessions, cookies, headers, and logging
IntrusionDetector The IntrusionDetector interface is intended to track security relevant events and identify attack behavior
LogFactory
Logger
Randomizer The Randomizer interface defines a set of methods for creating cryptographically random numbers and strings
SecurityConfiguration The SecurityConfiguration interface stores all configuration information that directs the behavior of the ESAPI implementation
User
Validator

Class Summary
ESAPI ESAPI locator class is provided to make it easy to gain access to the current ESAPI classes in use
SafeFile Extension to java
User$ANONYMOUS The ANONYMOUS user is used to represent an unidentified user
